trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SEQ_00<tab>Erenville's gaze is fixed on the bandits' hideout.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_TODO_00<tab>Use the pouch of foul-smelling attractant at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Zekowa.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_001<tab>A fair number appear to be gathered inside. Now's our chance.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_002<tab>I will keep watch from here. The attractant I leave to you.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_003<tab>Toss it into the bonfire near the middle of town. The yeheheceyaa will come soon after.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGA_000_010<tab>What's that smell?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGA_000_011<tab>Ugh, that <var 1A 02 /var>reeks<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGB_000_012<tab>What did you put in the fire!?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGA_000_013<tab>Wasn't me, I swear!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGC_000_014<tab>Ugh, did something die?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_WIHUWTE_000_015<tab>Someone wanna explain that ungodly stench to me?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGB_000_016<tab>B-Boss...? O-Over there...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_WIHUWTE_000_017<tab>Huh?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_WIHUWTE_000_018<tab>Wh-What in the world!?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGC_000_019<tab>Aaahhhhhh!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_SHAALOANIGANGA_000_020<tab>Run for your lives!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_WIHUWTE_000_021<tab>Hmph, so the smoke's what drew them here? I swear, when I find out who did this...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_022<tab>I'd say our friends have stirred up enough trouble. Time to retrieve the bracelet.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_023<tab>(-Zekowa-)Hey! What's going on out there!?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_024<tab>(-Zekowa-)I'm still in here in case you've forgotten!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_025<tab>Sit tight. We'll be back for you.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_026<tab>(-Zekowa-)What!? You gotta get me out of here now! They're gonna kill me!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_027<tab>(-Zekowa-)I'm beggin' you! Please!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_028<tab>Shhh! They'll hear you!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_WIHUWTE_000_029<tab>Shit. Who was that?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_030<tab>(-Zekowa-)Hey! Are you going to help me or what!?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_031<tab><sigh> The bracelet must wait. Let's break him out and withdraw for now.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_040<tab>All that effort, and naught to show for it...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_041<tab>Sorry about that... But damn, I didn't think anyone would have the balls to take on the Vulture!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>No need to apologize. We were planning to save you. Eventually.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_043<tab>Really? And I don't even know who you are. You secret admirers of mine or something?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_044<tab>Hehe, I'm just havin' fun with you. But I do appreciate the help.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_100_044<tab>This man they call the Vulture. I've seen his face before.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_110_044<tab>Was he not the officer you confronted in town?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_120_044<tab>The one and the same. When he's not masquerading as a gang leader, he serves as deputy chief of the Dustwatch.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_130_044<tab>That would explain why the bandits are so confident they can avoid capture.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_045<tab>You're trying to get back something the Vulture stole, right? Let me help. It's the least I can do after you bailed me out back there.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_046<tab>I have an idea where he's hid his cache. Reckon he's headed there now, too.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_047<tab>We can go together. I've got a score to settle with him myself.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_048<tab>I don't doubt that you do, but we need to know what it is first. Will you tell us?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_049<tab>Right, so. Those bandits at Tonatenyawi? They're called the Daybreakers, and it was me and my friends that founded the group...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_050<tab>B-But it wasn't a gang of cutthroats! Not back then...

TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_051<tab>We just wanted to protect people who couldn't protect themselves. Kids being harassed by bullies, workers being exploited by the mining concerns─folks who needed help to even the odds.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_052<tab>That was three years ago. And whenever we found someone scheming in the shadows, we settled matters the best way we knew how.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_053<tab>With a duel!
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_054<tab>I see. By the old laws, anyone who loses in a duel must be held to account for their crimes, even those in positions of authority.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_055<tab>And we made damn sure they did, every time. Before we knew it, our small band of friends commanded a force to be reckoned with.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_056<tab>Then, about a year ago, the Vulture and his thugs showed up. They got the better of us and took over the Daybreakers.

TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_057<tab>Everyone was afraid of him, so they did his bidding without question. But when he showed them how they could make a fortune, easily─<var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was when he really won them over.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_058<tab>Now the Daybreakers is nothing but a bunch of bandits and cutthroats who prey on the people it was created to protect.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_059<tab>I talked it over with my friends, Kwikana and Liwine, and we all agreed the only way to stop him was to challenge him to a duel.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_060<tab>And he accepted. I still remember how he gloated that he'd win...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_061<tab>But when the day came, he showed up with the Dustwatch and had my friends arrested on charges of robbery.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_062<tab>As if that wasn't enough, he set their bail at a price no one could ever hope to pay.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_063<tab>With them locked away, there was no one left to help me. None of my old friends from the Daybreakers, and certainly not the Dustwatch...
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_064<tab>And that's why you were ready to challenge him in the middle of town.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_065<tab>I was, until that guy with the spear stopped me.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_066<tab>No sooner had I stepped out of town than the Vulture's minions caught me by surprise. They took me prisoner, then...well, you know the rest.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_067<tab>You said the Dustwatch would be of no help. Are they all working for the Vulture, then?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_068<tab>No, not all of them.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_069<tab>The sheriff, Kemakka─he's as honest as they come, a staunch keeper of the peace. Problem is, he's a little too trusting and doesn't suspect a thing.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_070<tab>If it were my word against the deputy chief's, who do you think he'd believe?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_071<tab>Well, if he knows where this Vulture keeps his spoils, perhaps he can help us recover Namikka's bracelet. What do you think?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_072<tab>For what it's worth, I have a plan. But I can't do it alone.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_073<tab>A plan?
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_074<tab>All I ask is that you hear me out─but not here. I'll be waiting for you at Sheshenewezi Springs.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_075<tab>I guess we can decide what to do after he gives us the pitch.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_080<tab>Thanks, I owe you one. For a moment there I thought you might actually leave me behind.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_090<tab>Good, you're here.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ZEKOWA_000_091<tab>This is where he hides his loot. I expect he'll show up soon.
TEXT_KINGMD104_04915_ERENVILLE_000_095<tab>I'm grateful he could take us to the deputy chief, but it will all be for naught if we're seen.
